entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:28 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 06:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain at times heavy mixed with snow at times heavy changing to rain at times heavy this morning. Rainfall amount 40 mm. High plus 3. Forecast issued 06:23 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
